createdAt.description: The date and time when the email bounce data was created.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign associated with the email bounce data.

documentCreatedAt.description: The date and time when the internal document for Iterable was created.

documentUpdatedAt.description: The date and time when the internal document for Iterable was last updated.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message associated with the email bounce data.

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the email template associated with the bounce data.

email.description: The email address that encountered a bounce.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user associated with the bounced email address.

recipientState.description: The state of the recipient email address at the time of the bounce (e.g., active, inactive).
